en-US.summary: A collection of transformational and faith-inspiring Christian podcasts.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Edifi Podcast channel list
Alexa, ask Edifi Podcast search episodes about Jesus loves me
en-US.name: Edifi Podcast
en-US.description:
"The earth shall be full of the knowledge of the Lord as the waters cover the sea." (Isaiah 11:9)  

Are you looking for transformational and faith-inspiring Christian podcasts? Enable Edifi Podcast Skill — a truly powerful Alexa skill that brings together thousands of the best Christian podcasts in one place for your listening enjoyment. Cut through the noise and grow your faith by diving into the world’s top Christian podcasts today.

Edifi Podcast is filled with the best Christian podcasts — safe content that will edify and inspire your faith. With Edifi Podcast Alexa Skill, you can easily listen to latest episodes from Edifi promotion or popular channels. And you can also quickly search for new podcasts by channel or topic, and discover phenomenal, new Christian podcasts in the process. 

HOW DOES IT WORK?
Just ask your Alexa skill to talk to Edifi Podcast. We'll have promotion episodes and recommended channels when you need some podcasts, and you can also search channels or episodes by keywords when you want to listen to specific topic.

You can say...
-Alexa, open Edifi Podcast
-Alexa, tell Edifi Podcast play promotion episodes
-Alexa, tell Edifi Podcast list recommended channels
-Alexa, ask Edifi Podcast for my playlist
-Alexa, tell Edifi Podcast search channels
-Alexa, tell Edifi Podcast search episodes about 'God so loved the world'
